verses.text: Against \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; \w Woe|strong="H1945"\w* unto \w Nebo|strong="H5015"\w*! for it is \w spoiled|strong="H7703"\w*: \w Kiriathaim|strong="H7156"\w* is \w confounded|strong="H3001"\w* \add and\add* \w taken|strong="H3920"\w*: \w Misgab|strong="H4869"\w* is \w confounded|strong="H3001"\w* and \w dismayed|strong="H2865"\w*.\f + \fr 48.1 \ft Misgab: or, the high place\f*

\add There shall be\add* no more \w praise|strong="H8416"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*: in \w Heshbon|strong="H2809"\w* they have \w devised|strong="H2803"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* against it; \w come|strong="H3212"\w*, and let us cut it \w off|strong="H3772"\w* from \add being\add* a \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*. Also thou shalt be cut \w down|strong="H1826"\w*, O \w Madmen|strong="H4086"\w*; the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* shall \w pursue|strong="H3212"\w* \w thee|strong="H0310"\w*.\f + \fr 48.2 \ft be cut…: or, be brought to silence\f*\f + \fr 48.2 \ft pursue…: Heb. go after thee\f*

A \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of \w crying|strong="H6818"\w* \add shall be\add* from \w Horonaim|strong="H2773"\w*, \w spoiling|strong="H7701"\w* and \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w destruction|strong="H7667"\w*.
\w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* is \w destroyed|strong="H7665"\w*; her little \w ones|strong="H6810"\w* have caused a \w cry|strong="H2201"\w* to be \w heard|strong="H8085"\w*.

For in the going \w up|strong="H4608"\w* of \w Luhith|strong="H3872"\w* \w continual|strong="H1065"\w* \w weeping|strong="H1065"\w* shall go \w up|strong="H5927"\w*; for in the going \w down|strong="H4174"\w* of \w Horonaim|strong="H2773"\w* the \w enemies|strong="H6862"\w* have \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* a \w cry|strong="H6818"\w* of \w destruction|strong="H7667"\w*.\f + \fr 48.5 \ft continual…: Heb. weeping with weeping\f*

\w Flee|strong="H5127"\w*, \w save|strong="H4422"\w* your \w lives|strong="H5315"\w*, and \w be|strong="H1961"\w* like the \w heath|strong="H6176"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*.\f + \fr 48.6 \ft the heath: or, a naked tree\f*

¶ For because thou hast \w trusted|strong="H0982"\w* in thy \w works|strong="H4639"\w* and in thy \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w*, thou shalt also be \w taken|strong="H3920"\w*: and \w Chemosh|strong="H3645"\w* shall go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* into \w captivity|strong="H1473"\w* \add with\add* his \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* and his \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*.

And the \w spoiler|strong="H7703"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* upon every \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and no \w city|strong="H5892"\w* shall \w escape|strong="H4422"\w*: the \w valley|strong="H6010"\w* also shall \w perish|strong="H0006"\w*, and the \w plain|strong="H4334"\w* shall be \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w*, as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w spoken|strong="H0559"\w*.

\w Give|strong="H5414"\w* \w wings|strong="H6731"\w* unto \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, that it may \w flee|strong="H5323"\w* and get \w away|strong="H3318"\w*: for the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* thereof shall be \w desolate|strong="H8047"\w*, without any to \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w therein|strong="H2004"\w*.

\w Cursed|strong="H0779"\w* \add be\add* he that \w doeth|strong="H6213"\w* the \w work|strong="H4399"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w deceitfully|strong="H7423"\w*, and \w cursed|strong="H0779"\w* \add be\add* he that keepeth \w back|strong="H4513"\w* his \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* from \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*.\f + \fr 48.10 \ft deceitfully: or, negligently\f*

¶ \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* hath been at \w ease|strong="H7599"\w* from his \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*, and he hath \w settled|strong="H8252"\w* on his \w lees|strong="H8105"\w*, and hath not been \w emptied|strong="H7324"\w* from \w vessel|strong="H3627"\w* to \w vessel|strong="H3627"\w*, neither hath he \w gone|strong="H1980"\w* into \w captivity|strong="H1473"\w*: therefore his \w taste|strong="H2940"\w* \w remained|strong="H5975"\w* in him, and his \w scent|strong="H7381"\w* is not \w changed|strong="H4171"\w*.\f + \fr 48.11 \ft remained: Heb. stood\f*

Therefore, behold, the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that I will \w send|strong="H7971"\w* unto him \w wanderers|strong="H6808"\w*, that shall cause him to \w wander|strong="H6808"\w*, and shall \w empty|strong="H7324"\w* his \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w*, and \w break|strong="H5310"\w* their \w bottles|strong="H5035"\w*.

And \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* shall be \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w* of \w Chemosh|strong="H3645"\w*, as the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* was \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w* of \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w* their \w confidence|strong="H4009"\w*.
¶ How \w say|strong="H0559"\w* ye, We \add are\add* \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* and \w strong|strong="H2428"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* for the \w war|strong="H4421"\w*?

\w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* is \w spoiled|strong="H7703"\w*, and gone \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \add out of\add* her \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, and his \w chosen|strong="H4005"\w* young \w men|strong="H0970"\w* are gone \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to the \w slaughter|strong="H2874"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w King|strong="H4428"\w*, whose \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add is\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.\f + \fr 48.15 \ft his…: Heb. the choice of\f*

The \w calamity|strong="H0343"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \add is\add* \w near|strong="H7138"\w* to \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, and his \w affliction|strong="H7451"\w* \w hasteth|strong="H4116"\w* \w fast|strong="H3966"\w*.

All ye that are \w about|strong="H5439"\w* him, \w bemoan|strong="H5110"\w* him; and all ye that \w know|strong="H3045"\w* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, How is the \w strong|strong="H5797"\w* \w staff|strong="H4294"\w* \w broken|strong="H7665"\w*, \add and\add* the \w beautiful|strong="H8597"\w* \w rod|strong="H4731"\w*!

Thou \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* that dost \w inhabit|strong="H3427"\w* \w Dibon|strong="H1769"\w*, come \w down|strong="H3381"\w* from \add thy\add* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*, and \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* in \w thirst|strong="H6772"\w*; for the \w spoiler|strong="H7703"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* shall \w come|strong="H5927"\w* upon thee, \add and\add* he shall \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* thy strong \w holds|strong="H4013"\w*.

O \w inhabitant|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Aroer|strong="H6177"\w*, \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, and \w espy|strong="H6822"\w*; \w ask|strong="H7592"\w* him that \w fleeth|strong="H5127"\w*, and her that \w escapeth|strong="H4422"\w*, \add and\add* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, What is \w done|strong="H1961"\w*?\f + \fr 48.19 \ft inhabitant: Heb. inhabitress\f*

\w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* is \w confounded|strong="H3001"\w*; for it is broken \w down|strong="H2865"\w*: \w howl|strong="H3213"\w* and \w cry|strong="H2199"\w*; \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* ye it in \w Arnon|strong="H0769"\w*, that \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* is \w spoiled|strong="H7703"\w*,

And \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* is \w come|strong="H0935"\w* upon the \w plain|strong="H4334"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w*; upon \w Holon|strong="H2473"\w*, and upon \w Jahazah|strong="H3096"\w*, and upon \w Mephaath|strong="H4158"\w*,
And upon \w Dibon|strong="H1769"\w*, and upon \w Nebo|strong="H5015"\w*, and upon \w Beth-diblathaim|strong="H1015"\w*,
And upon \w Kiriathaim|strong="H7156"\w*, and upon \w Beth-gamul|strong="H1014"\w*, and upon \w Beth-meon|strong="H1010"\w*,

And upon \w Kerioth|strong="H7152"\w*, and upon \w Bozrah|strong="H1224"\w*, and upon all the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, \w far|strong="H7350"\w* or \w near|strong="H7138"\w*.

The \w horn|strong="H7161"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* is cut \w off|strong="H1438"\w*, and his \w arm|strong="H2220"\w* is \w broken|strong="H7665"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

¶ Make ye him \w drunken|strong="H7937"\w*: for he \w magnified|strong="H1431"\w* \add himself\add* against the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* also shall \w wallow|strong="H5606"\w* in his \w vomit|strong="H6892"\w*, and he also shall be in \w derision|strong="H7814"\w*.

For was not \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* a \w derision|strong="H7814"\w* unto thee? was he \w found|strong="H4672"\w* among \w thieves|strong="H1590"\w*? for \w since|strong="H1767"\w* thou \w spakest|strong="H1697"\w* of him, thou \w skippedst|strong="H5110"\w* for joy.\f + \fr 48.27 \ft skippedst…: or, movedst thyself\f*

O ye that \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, \w leave|strong="H5800"\w* the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, and \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* in the \w rock|strong="H5553"\w*, and be like the \w dove|strong="H3123"\w* \add that\add* maketh her \w nest|strong="H7077"\w* in the \w sides|strong="H5676"\w* of the \w hole’s|strong="H6354"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*.

We have \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* the \w pride|strong="H1347"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, (he is \w exceeding|strong="H3966"\w* \w proud|strong="H1343"\w*) his \w loftiness|strong="H1363"\w*, and his \w arrogancy|strong="H1346"\w*, and his \w pride|strong="H1347"\w*, and the \w haughtiness|strong="H7312"\w* of his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.

I \w know|strong="H3045"\w* his \w wrath|strong="H5678"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; but \add it shall\add* not \add be\add* so; his \w lies|strong="H0907"\w* shall not so \w effect|strong="H6213"\w* \add it\add*.\f + \fr 48.30 \ft his lies…: or, those on whom he stayeth (Heb. his bars) do not right\f*

Therefore will I \w howl|strong="H3213"\w* for \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, and I will cry \w out|strong="H2199"\w* for all \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*; \add mine heart\add* shall \w mourn|strong="H1897"\w* for the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Kir-heres|strong="H7025"\w*.

O \w vine|strong="H1612"\w* of \w Sibmah|strong="H7643"\w*, I will \w weep|strong="H1058"\w* for thee with the \w weeping|strong="H1065"\w* of \w Jazer|strong="H3270"\w*: thy \w plants|strong="H5189"\w* are gone \w over|strong="H5674"\w* the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, they \w reach|strong="H5060"\w* \add even\add* to the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* of \w Jazer|strong="H3270"\w*: the \w spoiler|strong="H7703"\w* is \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* upon thy summer \w fruits|strong="H7019"\w* and upon thy \w vintage|strong="H1210"\w*.

And \w joy|strong="H8057"\w* and \w gladness|strong="H1524"\w* is \w taken|strong="H0622"\w* from the plentiful \w field|strong="H3759"\w*, and from the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*; and I have caused \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* to \w fail|strong="H7673"\w* from the \w winepresses|strong="H3342"\w*: none shall \w tread|strong="H1869"\w* with \w shouting|strong="H1959"\w*; \add their\add* \w shouting|strong="H1959"\w* \add shall be\add* no \w shouting|strong="H1959"\w*.

From the \w cry|strong="H2201"\w* of \w Heshbon|strong="H2809"\w* \add even\add* unto \w Elealeh|strong="H0500"\w*, \add and even\add* unto \w Jahaz|strong="H3096"\w*, have they \w uttered|strong="H5414"\w* their \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, from \w Zoar|strong="H6820"\w* \add even\add* unto \w Horonaim|strong="H2773"\w*, \add as\add* an \w heifer|strong="H5697"\w* of three years \w old|strong="H7992"\w*: for the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* also of \w Nimrim|strong="H5249"\w* shall be \w desolate|strong="H4923"\w*.\f + \fr 48.34 \ft desolate: Heb. desolations\f*

Moreover I will cause to \w cease|strong="H7673"\w* in \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, him that \w offereth|strong="H5927"\w* in the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w*, and him that burneth \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* to his \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*.

Therefore mine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* shall \w sound|strong="H1993"\w* for \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* like \w pipes|strong="H2485"\w*, and mine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* shall \w sound|strong="H1993"\w* like \w pipes|strong="H2485"\w* for the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Kir-heres|strong="H7025"\w*: because the \w riches|strong="H3502"\w* \add that\add* he hath \w gotten|strong="H6213"\w* are \w perished|strong="H0006"\w*.

For every \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \add shall be\add* \w bald|strong="H7144"\w*, and every \w beard|strong="H2206"\w* \w clipped|strong="H1639"\w*: upon all the \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \add shall be\add* \w cuttings|strong="H1417"\w*, and upon the \w loins|strong="H4975"\w* \w sackcloth|strong="H8242"\w*.\f + \fr 48.37 \ft clipped: Heb. diminished\f*

\add There shall be\add* \w lamentation|strong="H4553"\w* generally upon all the \w housetops|strong="H1406"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, and in the \w streets|strong="H7339"\w* thereof: for I have \w broken|strong="H7665"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* like a \w vessel|strong="H3627"\w* wherein \add is\add* no \w pleasure|strong="H2656"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

They shall \w howl|strong="H3213"\w*, \add saying\add*, How is it broken \w down|strong="H2865"\w*! how hath \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w turned|strong="H6437"\w* the \w back|strong="H6203"\w* with \w shame|strong="H0954"\w*! so shall \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* be a \w derision|strong="H7814"\w* and a \w dismaying|strong="H4288"\w* to all them \w about|strong="H5439"\w* him.\f + \fr 48.39 \ft back: Heb. neck\f*

For thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; Behold, he shall \w fly|strong="H1675"\w* as an \w eagle|strong="H5404"\w*, and shall \w spread|strong="H6566"\w* his \w wings|strong="H3671"\w* over \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*.

\w Kerioth|strong="H7152"\w* is \w taken|strong="H3920"\w*, and the strong \w holds|strong="H4679"\w* are \w surprised|strong="H8610"\w*, and the mighty \w men’s|strong="H1368"\w* \w hearts|strong="H3820"\w* in \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* at that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* shall be as the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* of a \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* in her \w pangs|strong="H6887"\w*.\f + \fr 48.41 \ft Kerioth: or, The cities\f*

And \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* shall be \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w* from \add being\add* a \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, because he hath \w magnified|strong="H1431"\w* \add himself\add* against the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

\w Fear|strong="H6343"\w*, and the \w pit|strong="H6354"\w*, and the \w snare|strong="H6341"\w*, \add shall be\add* upon thee, O \w inhabitant|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

He that \w fleeth|strong="H5127"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* the \w fear|strong="H6343"\w* shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* into the \w pit|strong="H6354"\w*; and he that getteth \w up|strong="H5927"\w* out of the \w pit|strong="H6354"\w* shall be \w taken|strong="H3920"\w* in the \w snare|strong="H6341"\w*: for I will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* upon it, \add even\add* upon \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, the \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of their \w visitation|strong="H6486"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

They that \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* under the \w shadow|strong="H6738"\w* of \w Heshbon|strong="H2809"\w* because of the \w force|strong="H3581"\w*: but a \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* shall come \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of \w Heshbon|strong="H2809"\w*, and a \w flame|strong="H3852"\w* from the \w midst|strong="H0996"\w* of \w Sihon|strong="H5511"\w*, and shall \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* the \w corner|strong="H6285"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, and the crown of the \w head|strong="H6936"\w* of the \w tumultuous|strong="H7588"\w* \w ones|strong="H1121"\w*.\f + \fr 48.45 \ft tumultuous…: Heb. children of noise\f*

\w Woe|strong="H0188"\w* be unto thee, O \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*! the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of \w Chemosh|strong="H3645"\w* \w perisheth|strong="H0006"\w*: for thy \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* are \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* \w captives|strong="H7628"\w*, and thy \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w captives|strong="H7633"\w*.\f + \fr 48.46 \ft captives, and: Heb. in captivity, etc\f*

¶ Yet will I bring \w again|strong="H7725"\w* the \w captivity|strong="H7622"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* in the \w latter|strong="H0319"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*. Thus \w far|strong="H2008"\w* \add is\add* the \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*.
